questions.question: The working principle of Pirani gauge is:
In a Pirani gauge, the pressure is related to the ________.
A Pirani gauge sensor is used to measure pressure of the order of
The correct relationship between gauge pressure, atmospheric pressure and absolute pressure is

answers.a: Gauge pressure = Atmospheric pressure - Absolute pressure
answers.b: Gauge pressure = Atmospheric pressure + Absolute pressure
answers.c: Absolute pressure = Atmospheric pressure + Gauge pressure
